name: Sleepy Rhythm Machine
description:
Sleepy Rhythm Machine v0.808

a slightly broken machine

made with <3 for #renpyjam (september 2018)

it's a 5 minute experience with a word count of over 50 (it has 57 words according to lint)

i don't know why but I wanted to make a sort of drum machine in ren'py

it can only play one song

a song called 'Kafka Beach Episode' that I wrote for my upcoming VN (Departure Lounge). This version may not be exactly the same in the VN, or it might be, time will tell on that one!

hopefully some people may find some of the code helpful!?
though the bugs might not be to your taste XD
